resource.internalDescrip: T. gondii RH strain chromosomes retrieved from GenBank

info.description: Scaffold genome sequence for T. gondii type I RH strain provided on 2006-09-25, by Matt Berriman (The Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute), Jim Ajioka (University of Cambridge). Contact: Matt Berriman mb4@sanger.ac.uk. (Chromosomes Ia and Ib only).

resource.pluginArgs: --sourceIdRegex ">(\S+\(\w+\))$" --fastaFile @downloadDir@/WatanabeTgRH_PredictedTrancripts/reffull_tg.fas --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --SOTermName 'transcript' --ncbiTaxId 383379 --libraryVector 'pME18SFL3' --contactName 'Junichi Watanabe' --contactAddress1 "Institute of Medical Science; The University of Tokyo, Department of Parasitology" --contactAddress2 "4-6-1, Shirokanedai, Minatoku, Tokyo 108-8639, Japan" --putativeFullLength --libraryStage 'tachyzoites' --libraryName 'derivedFromWatanabeTgRH' --libraryDesc "Predicted full length transcript sequence produced after BLAT alignment of the WatanabeTgRH EST library sequences to the genome and correction of the cDNA sequences using annotated gene sequences."

info.displayName: T. gondii RH predicted full length transcripts
info.institution: Department of Parasitology, Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo
info.description: T. gondii RH EST sequences (J. Watanabe, H. Wakaguri, M. Sasaki, Y. Suzuki, S. Sugano at Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo).

resource.pluginArgs: --sourceIdRegex ">(\w+)$" --fastaFile @downloadDir@/WatanabeTgRH_EstLibrary/onepass_tg.fas --externalDatabaseName %EXT_DB_NAME% --externalDatabaseVer %EXT_DB_RLS_VER% --SOTermName 'EST' --ncbiTaxId 383379 --libraryVector 'pME18SFL3' --contactName 'Junichi Watanabe' --contactAddress1 "Institute of Medical Science; The University of Tokyo, Department of Parasitology" --contactAddress2 "4-6-1, Shirokanedai, Minatoku, Tokyo 108-8639, Japan" --libraryName 'WatanabeTgRH' --libraryStage 'tachyzoites' --libraryDesc "Toxoplasma gondii RH tachyzoites were infected into Vero (T25) cells and incubated in EMEM medium supplemented with 8% fetal bovine serum for 72 hours in vitro. Infected cells were collected with a scraper and passed through 27G needle for three times and purified by filtration through Millex SV filters (pore size 5 um, Millipore). Cells were collected by centrifugation at 2,000 rpm for 10 min and washed in EMEM medium without FBS. Parasites were suspended at 1x107/ml in EMEM medium without FBS. Five-week old ICR female mice were infected with 1 ml parasites intraperitoneally.Three days after infection, mice were sacrificed by cervical dislocation. Parasites were collected by washing the peritoneal cavity with 5 ml EMEM, passed through 5 um filter, washed in PBS and suspended at 2-3x109 parasite/ml. 20 ml TRI REGENT (Sigma) was added to 1 ml parasite solution, mixed by pipetting, frozen in liquid nitrogen and kept at -80C until used."

info.institution: Department of Parasitology, Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo
info.description: T. gondii RH predicted full length transcript sequences (J. Watanabe, H. Wakaguri, M. Sasaki, Y. Suzuki, S. Sugano at Institute of Medical Science, University of Tokyo).
